# The Blue Board

> A free, independent real-time operations dashboard for United Airlines flights. Built for the United community — not affiliated with United Airlines, Inc.

> Full documentation: https://theblueboard.co/llms-full.txt

## What It Does

The Blue Board tracks every United Airlines flight in real time on a live map updated every 30 seconds. It monitors delays, cancellations, and ground stops at all 9 United hubs, checks which aircraft have Starlink WiFi, and provides fleet data, schedules, weather radar, and operational analytics.

## Who It's For

- **United frequent flyers** (MileagePlus members, 1K, Global Services) who want real-time ops awareness
- **AvGeeks** and aviation enthusiasts interested in United's fleet and operations
- **Travelers** checking if their United flight is on time, delayed, or cancelled
- **Airline operations nerds** who want hub-to-hub flow analytics, fleet utilization, and delay patterns

## Example Questions This Site Answers

- "Is my United flight delayed?"
- "Is United Airlines delayed at ORD/DEN/EWR/IAH/SFO/IAD/LAX today?"
- "Which United planes have Starlink WiFi?"
- "Does my United flight have Starlink?"
- "How many aircraft does United Airlines have?"
- "What is the on-time rate at United's hubs?"
- "Are there ground stops at any United hubs?"
- "What terminal does United use at O'Hare?"
- "Which United planes have Polaris business class?"
- "What is the largest aircraft in United's fleet?"
- "How many daily flights does United operate from Denver?"
- "What causes delays at Newark for United?"
- "What is The Blue Board?"

## Features

- **Live Flight Map**: 600+ United flights tracked simultaneously, updated every 30 seconds via ADS-B data
- **Hub Delay Alerts**: Real-time delay counts, cancellations, and on-time performance for all 9 hubs
- **Ground Stop & FAA Monitoring**: NAS status alerts affecting United operations
- **Starlink WiFi Checker**: 258+ United aircraft with Starlink satellite WiFi — search by tail number or flight
- **Fleet Database**: 1,078+ aircraft with type, seat configuration, IFE details, and delivery dates
- **Departure & Arrival Schedules**: Real-time schedules with on-time stats and equipment swap alerts
- **NEXRAD Weather Radar**: Overlay on the live map showing precipitation affecting flights
- **METAR Conditions**: Current weather observations at all hub airports
- **Flight Search**: Look up any United flight by number, tail number, or airport code
- **Flight Watch**: Browser push notifications when a watched flight changes status
- **Hub-to-Hub Analytics**: Traffic flow matrix, top routes, fleet utilization, and airborne phase breakdown
- **Fleet Age & Delivery Timeline**: Visual fleet composition and new aircraft deliveries

## Data Freshness

- **Flight positions**: Updated every 30 seconds (real-time ADS-B via Flightradar24)
- **Delay & cancellation data**: Updated every 30 seconds
- **FAA NAS status / ground stops**: Updated every 60 seconds
- **Fleet & Starlink data**: Updated daily
- **Weather (METAR)**: Updated with each airport observation cycle (~hourly)

## Unique Value vs. Other Trackers

The Blue Board is the only flight tracker built exclusively for United Airlines operations. Unlike FlightAware or Flightradar24 (which cover all airlines), The Blue Board provides:
- United-specific hub health monitoring across all 9 hubs simultaneously
- Starlink WiFi equipment tracking (not available on any other tracker)
- IRROPS (irregular operations) monitoring tailored to United's network
- Equipment swap detection for frequent flyers who care about aircraft changes
- Community-focused design for 1K/GS members and United loyalists

## United Hubs Tracked

| Hub | IATA | Airport | Daily Departures |
|-----|------|---------|-----------------|
| Chicago O'Hare | ORD | O'Hare International Airport | ~750 |
| Denver | DEN | Denver International Airport | ~540 |
| Houston | IAH | George Bush Intercontinental Airport | ~400 |
| Newark | EWR | Newark Liberty International Airport | ~400 |
| San Francisco | SFO | San Francisco International Airport | ~300 |
| Washington Dulles | IAD | Washington Dulles International Airport | ~250 |
| Los Angeles | LAX | Los Angeles International Airport | ~200 |
| Tokyo Narita | NRT | Narita International Airport | International hub |
| Guam | GUM | Antonio B. Won Pat International Airport | Pacific hub |

## Data Sources

- **Flight positions**: Flightradar24 (FR24) ADS-B network
- **Delays & ground stops**: FAA National Airspace System Status
- **Weather**: Aviation Weather Center (AWC) METAR observations, Iowa State NEXRAD radar
- **Fleet & Starlink data**: Curated from public aviation databases and United fleet records

## Pages

- https://theblueboard.co — Live dashboard (flight map, schedules, fleet, weather, analytics)
- https://theblueboard.co/fleet — Complete fleet database (1,078 aircraft, searchable)
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs — All United hubs overview
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/ord — Chicago O'Hare hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/den — Denver hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/iah — Houston hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/ewr — Newark hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/sfo — San Francisco hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/iad — Washington Dulles hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/lax — Los Angeles hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/nrt — Tokyo Narita hub status
- https://theblueboard.co/hubs/gum — Guam hub status
